function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to disrupted supply chains and altered social practices.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, potential for new outbreaks, and higher infection rates.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, improve sanitation standards, and enforce social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, touchless technologies, and air purification systems.","People":"Workers, travelers, and individuals in crowded environments.","Owner":"Government health agencies, employers, and building operators."},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding the lasting impact of the pandemic on social and political practices, including telework, travel, and mobility.","Impact":"Potential for entrenchment of unsustainable practices and loss of momentum for sustainability initiatives.","Mitigation":"Promote sustainable transportation and telework policies, invest in infrastructure for active transportation, and encourage behavior change through education and incentives.","Technologies":"Smart mobility solutions, telecommuting tools, and urban planning innovations.","People":"Communities, workers, and individuals navigating changes in work and travel norms.","Owner":"Local government, employers, and community organizations."}]}
